name: Archiver3
tagline: All-in-one backup, verification, and restore Python scripts, leveraging rsync and Truecrypt volumes. Ideal for encrypted TNO (trust no one) cloud backups.
body:
ArchiveR3
=========

All-in-one backup, verification, and restore Python scripts, leveraging rsync and Truecrypt volumes. Ideal for encrypted TNO (trust no one) cloud backups.

!!! This code is not ready for prime time.  I'm just checking it in so I can start revision control. !!!

Christopher 'r3cgm' Mann - 1/1/2014
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
